description.value: Primary Energy: Water 2 (conjuring clean water) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (close range) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 3 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Water Potential + Water Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Create up to 10 gallons of clean water in an open container. Or create rain in 30ft cube that extinguishes open flames. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 5 gallons, 2 = 10 gallons, 3 = 20 gallons, 4 = 40 gallons, 5 = 80 gallons
